message.name: ERR_FV_EXPECTED_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Expected Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_EXPECTED_START_DATE_BEFORE_EARLIEST_START_DATE
message.locale: This milestone cannot start before %1d. Please enter a new expected start date.

message.name: ERR_FV_MILESTONE_EMPTY
message.locale: Milestone must be selected.

message.name: ERR_RV_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: This %1s cannot be modified as it is already closed.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXPECTED_START_DATE_AFTER_EXPECTED_END_DATE
message.locale: The expected start date must be earlier than the expected end date.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The actual start date must be equal to or earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_AFTER_ACTUAL_END_DATE
message.locale: The actual start date must be equal to or earlier than the actual end date.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The actual start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ACTUAL_END_DATE_BEFORE_ACTUAL_START_DATE_OR_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The actual end date must be greater than or equal to the actual start date, and equal to or less than todays date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXPECTED_START_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: The expected start date cannot be modified as an actual start date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXPECTED_END_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: The expected end date cannot be modified as an actual end date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_RV_MILESTONE_NO_DELETE_INPROGRESS_OR_COMPLETED
message.locale: Milestone cannot be deleted as it has a status of In Progress or Completed.

message.name: INF_MILESTONE_RESPONSIBILITY_ASSIGNMENT_SUBJECT
message.locale: You have been assigned as the user responsible for the %1s milestone.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_ID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Case id must be entered

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLETION_EVENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Completion Event must be entered

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLETION_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Completion Date must be entered

message.name: ERR_FV_CREATION_EVENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Creation Event must be entered

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLETION_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: Completion date must be on or after actual start date

message.name: ERR_FV_COMPLETION_DATE_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Completion date must be on or before current date

message.name: ERR_XFV_RELATED_ID_REQUIRED_IF_COMPONENT_PRESENT
message.locale: Related ID is required if Component Category is present.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RELATED_ID_REQUIRED_IF_COMPONENT_TYPE_PRESENT
message.locale: Related ID is required if Component Type is present.
